Officially, Mr. Paul Bremer reported to Mr. Donald Rumsfeld . But he viewed himself as the president's man, had a background in the State Department, and a relationship with Condoleezza Rice , says Mr. Donald Rumsfeld . So Mr. Paul Bremer chose what guidance he preferred, which Mr. Donald Rumsfeld describes as the equivalent of having "four or eight hands on the steering wheel." , Calif.-- Google co-founder Larry Page will take charge of the company's day-to-day operations as chief executive officer, replacing current CEO Eric Schmidt , who will focus on strategic projects and new products. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google. "By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead
